name: Downline Organizer 4.0 HD
short_description:
Powered by http://www.best-price-performance.com

Software: Browserware, Browserapp
Requirements: Adobe Flash Player, Adobe Shockwave Plugin

Easy to use , just download the file and open it with any web browser.

Downline Organizer 4.0 HD is designed specifically for people from the area of network marketing, affiliate marketing and multilevel marketing. It is used to optimize the downline, with the help of a dynamic downline generator and interactive statistics.  

Downline Organizer 4.0 HD are usefull for presentations or to analyzing compensation plans for all kind of multilevel marketing business.   

 For example, one can compare the multi-level marketing company with each other and determine when the break-even point was reached.  

Thanks for sharing and rate!
summary: Analyzing compensation plans for all kind of network marketing
